name: OAuthRouter
description: Local OAuth-backed LLM router + localhost proxy

proxyAuthToken.description: Auth token required on ALL local proxy requests. If omitted, a random token is generated for this process.

maxRequestInputTokens.description: Reject requests whose estimated input tokens exceed this value.

maxRequestOutputTokens.description: Reject requests whose requested max_tokens exceed this value.

dailyInputTokenBudget.description: Reject requests once total estimated input tokens for the current UTC day exceeds this value.

dailyOutputTokenBudget.description: Reject requests once total estimated output tokens for the current UTC day exceeds this value.

dailyRequestBudget.description: Reject requests once total requests for the current UTC day exceeds this value.

allowlistModels.description: If set, only these model IDs are allowed (e.g. 'openai/gpt-4o-mini').

denylistModels.description: If set, these model IDs are blocked (e.g. 'anthropic/claude-opus-4').
